articles.author: Toyin Owoseje
articles.title: Idris Elba teams up with media mogul Mo Abudu to nurture African film and TV talent - CNN
articles.description: "Luther" star Idris Elba is joining forces with Nigerian media mogul Mo Abudu in a mission to champion representation and diverse storytelling in the global film and TV industry.
articles.content:
Luther star Idris Elba is joining forces with Nigerian media mogul Mo Abudu in a mission to champion representation and diverse storytelling in the global film and TV industry.
